data.comment: The match has started at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Juarez territory.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
In the minute 6, San Luis drive upfield and German Berterame gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Juarez defender.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
German Berterame is on target to give San Luis a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Free kick San Luis.
In San Luis de Potosi, San Luis push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a San Luis throw-in in Juarez's half.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 15, In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda awards Juarez a goal kick.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Juarez.
Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Free kick in a good position for Juarez!
In the minute 20, Dionicio Escalante is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of San Luis.
Free kick Juarez.
In the minute 23, Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to Juarez.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 28, Juarez push upfield and Flavio Santos gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert San Luis defence.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to San Luis.
At Alfonso Lastras Ramirez, Gustavo Velazquez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 30, Juarez have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of San Luis.
Throw-in San Luis.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In San Luis de Potosi San Luis attack through Nicolas Ibanez. The finish is off target, however.
Juarez have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Juarez close to the penalty box.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
In the minute 38, Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
San Luis advance rapidly upfield but Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda blows for offside.
In the minute 44, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Flavio Santos (Juarez) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 45, Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Juarez's Maximiliano Olivera is back in action after a slight knock.
Juarez push forward at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez and Mauro Fernandez gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the San Luis defence.
In the minute 45, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda awards San Luis a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda waits before resuming play because Maximiliano Olivera for Juarez is still down.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Juarez to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Bruno Romo for Juarez has been booked by Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 50, San Luis's Rodrigo Noya gets in a shot on goal at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
Juarez are caught offside.
In the minute 52, Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 54, Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda awards San Luis a goal kick.
San Luis push upfield but Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda quickly pulls them for offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Juarez at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Throw-in San Luis.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda awards the home team a throw-in.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a San Luis throw-in in Juarez's half.
In the minute 59, Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Juarez push forward at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez and Luis Lopez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined San Luis defence.
At Alfonso Lastras Ramirez, San Luis are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a throw-in for San Luis, close to Juarez's area.
In the minute 64, The away team replace Martin Rabunal with Eryc Castillo.
Guillermo Vazquez (San Luis) is making a first substitution, with Anderson Julio replacing Pablo Barrera.
Throw-in Juarez.
In the minute 66, In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
San Luis have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Juarez.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda.
In the minute 71, Brian Rubio gets an equalizer for Juarez. The score is now 1-1.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a Juarez throw-in in San Luis's half.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anderson Julio for San Luis drives towards goal at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 79, San Luis make their second substitution with Juan Castro replacing Luis Leon.
Flavio Santos (Juarez) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
In the minute 81, Mauro Quiroga (San Luis) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Juarez at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Gabriel Caballero is making the team's second substitution at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez with Javier Nevarez replacing Mauro Fernandez.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Flavio Santos (Juarez) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for San Luis close to the penalty box.
San Luis's Camilo Mayada gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
In the minute 85, Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nicolas Ibanez (San Luis) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 88, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Hernandez is on a sub for Luis Lopez for Juarez.
The away team have replaced Flavio Santos with Alberto Acosta. This is the third substitution made today by Gabriel Caballero.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Juarez have a goal kick.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Saul Alfredo Silva Pineda signals a free kick to Juarez.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Juarez territory.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Maximiliano Olivera (Juarez) gets a yellow card.
Juan Castro (San Luis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
